means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 费洛斯取自父名，来源于Fellow,含义是“费洛之子”(son of Fellow)

sentence.Network_en: I was on my own and these fellows came along towards me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我正一个人走着，一些家伙朝我走过来。

sentence.Network_en: The boy was frail and never ganged with his fellows at school.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个男孩身体虚弱,从不和同学们一起玩.

sentence.Network_en: Sing up , fellows, this is supposed to be a celebration, not a funeral!
sentence.Network_cn: 伙计们,大声唱, 这是开庆祝会, 不是送葬!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国的机床制造厂家费洛斯(FELLOWS) 公司和德国的利渤海尔(LIEBHERR)公司由于具有悠久的机床生产历史以及先进的技术,因此在机床市场上占有举足轻重的地位,FELLOWS FS.
you fellows always laythe line for me every pay day .每逢发工资的日子你们这些小伙子总是替我来付钱。

the Last Unicorn . Peter S. Beagle . when a unicorn receives word that all the other unicorns have vanished , she embarks on a quest to find her lost fellows .最后的独角兽》（奇幻)——彼得·S。·贝格尔当一只独角兽收到其它已经消失的独角兽的音信时，她踏上了寻找她失踪的同伴的路途。
you fellows are killing yourselves .你们这些家伙在慢性自杀.

list.abs: 场景英语_百度文库 ... professor 教授 teaching fellow 讲师 assistant tutor / mentor / director / supervisor 导师.
... 研究员/ Wissenschaftliche Mitarbeiterin 博士后/ Postdoctoral Fellow 助理研究员/ Research Associate.
★从英文到中文的直译习语[1]-英语资源-无忧考网 ... double-faced 两面派的 fellow traveler 同路人 iron-curtain 铁幕.
中国特色词的译法 - Billwang 工业设计论坛 ... intern 实习生 prize fellow 奖学金生 boarder 寄宿生.

entry.def: You use fellow to describe people who are in the same situation as you, or people you feel you have something in common with.

example.ex: She discovered to her pleasure, a talent for making her fellow guests laugh...
example.tran: 她高兴地发现自己具备一种能把其他客人逗笑的才能。

example.ex: Even in jail, my fellow inmates treated me with kindness.
example.tran: 就算在监狱里，狱友们对我也很友善。

entry.def: A fellow is a man or boy.

example.ex: By all accounts, Rodger would appear to be a fine fellow.

entry.def: Your fellows are the people who you work with, do things with, or who are like you in some way.

example.ex: He stood out in terms of competence from all his fellows...
example.tran: 他在能力上远远胜过其他同事。

example.ex: People looked out for one another and were concerned about the welfare of their fellows.
example.tran: 人们守望相助，关心着彼此的幸福。

entry.def: A fellow of an academic or professional association is someone who is a specially elected member of it, usually because of their work or achievements or as a mark of honour.

example.ex: ...the fellows of the Zoological Society of London.

auth_sentence.content: What sad wild fellows some of the chaps were.

auth_sentence.content: Such fellows don't know nothing at all.
